column5: Thats a tough one photoz.  I think you'd be best to contact MNR for proper clarification  Here is some info that may be of use, but may not.  It is more related to zones 13 & 14 than it is to zone 20.  It does give clarification however of where the river ends and where the lake begins for several rivers in zone 16.  http://www.mnr.gov.on.ca/en/Business/LetsF...age/198482.html  Again, you'd probably be best to check with the MNR directly though
No idea.  Some tribs dump very clearly into the lake such as Oshawa, farewell etc etc  others dont like you said bowmanville, port hope  not too sure

if you plan to surf cast, i would be pretty sure that you would be casting out towards the lake and not the river. If you were to cast right in the river than your limit would be two. Chances are if you are fishing the lake you will be surf casting. (just dont cast toward the river)
